# ReflectionHelpers.HasInterface method

Determines if the type implments given interface.

```csharp
public static bool HasInterface(Type reflectedType, Type requiredInterface)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| reflectedType | Reflected type. |
| requiredInterface | Required interface. |

## Return Value

True when the type implements given interface.
